constituent: obese, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, compass, direction
heisigStory: If you eat too much, you may need a compass to find your way around the obese mass of flesh that piles up in the midsection. Compare this with your stories for round (Frame 44) and fat (Frame 494), similar in meaning but distinct in imagery.
koohiiStory2: Yo momma so obese, she changed the direction of the moon.
myStory: chất béo. mỡ. béo phì. hướng về bộ phận béo phì
